titleStmt.title: An ordinance for giving further time for approbation of publique preachers. Fryday June 23. 1654. Ordered by his Highness the Lord protector, and his council, that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Henry Scobell, Clerk of the Council.
Orders in Council. 1654-06-23.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
England and Wales. Council of State. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by William du-Gard and Henry Hills, printers to His Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: The final leaf contains order to print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
